attributes.additional_details:
In Afghanistan as of September 15, 2012, the British forces have suffered 430 fatalities and 1,875 wounded in action, another 3,759 have suffered from disease or non-battle injuries.
Far too many lives have been lost. We want British troops pulled out of Afghanistan now NOT 2014 but NOW!
Please show your support.....

rejection.details: The e-petition that already exists is titled "Pull out of Afghanistan immediately to halt further troop injuries and deaths"
